name: BabesiosisTestsForBabesiaSpeciesAntibody
title: Babesiosis (Tests for Babesia species Antibody)
purpose:
(Clinical Focus: This set of values contains codes for laboratory test names associated with detecting the presence of Babesia species antibody.),(Data Element Scope: Laboratory tests names that were ordered or observed.),(Inclusion Criteria: component: Babesia antibody;  LOINC search: "Babesia Ab -Theileria -panel -interpretation"

Plus: 67867-2 Babesia sp identified in Unspecified specimen),(Exclusion Criteria: 34940-7
Babesia microti IgG and IgM panel - Serum
67866-4
Babesia identification panel - Unspecified specimen
87547-6
Borrelia burgdorferi Ab and Anaplasma phagocytophilum, Babesia microti and Ehrlichia chaffeensis IgG panel - Serum)
